name: Infinity Pizza
description:
WASD to move
Mouse to look
Scroll Wheel to change mouse sensitivity

I RECCOMMEND PLAYING BEFORE READING THIS  TO GET THE FULL UNEXPECTED EXPERIENCE

For the GPC February 2022 Mechanics Jam I decided to make something stupid because I had no better ideas. This is a proof of concept/prototype infinity pizza which follows two of the jam themes. Cloning is present as the pizza clones itself after taking a bite to regenerate, and inversion is present because you can manually flip the pizza over with the F key

Just give it a chance

There are exactly two hidden features of this mechanic demo, comment if you find either! :)

Credits for things I didn't make:

"Plain Pizza Slice" by inciprocal (https://skfb.ly/6VVBL)
Hand model by eafg (https://www.blendswap.com/blend/5152)
Heavy NOM NOM is from TF2

Other sounds from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
Madonna - Hung Up is also used.. Somewhere..
